text:
Stephanie Beatriz Bischoff Alvizuri (born 10 February 1981) is an Argentine-born American actress. She is best known for playing Detective Rosa Diaz in the FOX comedy series "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" and Jessica in the independent drama "Short Term 12" (2013). She will voice Sweet Mayhem in the 2019 movie '.
In July 2016, Beatriz revealed on Twitter that she is bisexual.
